abstract: The father of Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney was arrested as part of an investigation into suspicious bets placed on a Scottish League game.
snippet: The father of Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney was arrested as part of an investigation into suspicious bets placed on a Scottish League game.
lead_paragraph: The father of Manchester United striker Wayne Rooney was one of nine men arrested on Thursday as part of an investigation into suspicious bets placed on a Scottish league match in December. Rooney's father, also named Wayne, was arrested at his home in Liverpool. Rooney's uncle, Richie, was also charged, though the younger Wayne Rooney -- who is in Montenegro with England's national team for a Euro 2012 qualifier -- was not implicated, the police said.

headline.main: Rooney's Father Arrested in Betting Investigation
